Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition:
dork \dork\ (d[^o]rk), n. 1. a person who is stupid, socially inept, or ridiculous; -- always used disparagingly. [slang.]
Syn: nerd; jerk. [PJC]
2. the penis. [vulgar slang] [PJC]
dork n : a dull stupid fatuous person [syn: {jerk}]
